Html:
Hi!

I'm using your PHPExcel( @version 1.7.6, 2011-02-27) tool in Webix to export the data table information to Excel, but I noticed that the speed of exporting is a little bit slow, It takes 3 min to export 2200 rows with 8 columns of information. Consider that I use the tool in local mode, not with the link Webix use.

Is this normal? or maybe I should change some configuration settings in phpMyAdmin?

I hope you can help me out.

I'm using WAMP Server 2.2
PHP version 5.4.3
Apache 2.2.22
MySQL 5.5.24
